title: (Emergency Electricity Generation) (Amendment) Act 2023 (Commencement)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Environmental Protection Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Environmental Protection Agency 
(Emergency Electricity Generation) (Amendment) Act 2023 (Commencement) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited environmental protection agency (emergency electricity generation) (amendment) act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: (Emergency Electricity Generation) (Amendment) Act 2023 (Commencement)
heading: 2. The 30th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
(Emergency Electricity Generation) 

Environmental Protection Agency 
(Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 6 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 March, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [136] 3
